attributes.action: Add 2p per Litre to fuel in  tax and scrap Road Fund Licence.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Adding 2p per litre would enable the Government to scrap the road fund licence, and would be more fair in that the more you drive the more you pay (the more you drive the more damage to the roads you do i.e. HGV vehicles) plus all those who don't pay the present scheme (tax dodgers) cannot avoid paying it so the £300m (est.)lost from non payment this year would be back in the government funds.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
